text: The Hero of the Soviet Union was a medal awarded to members of the Soviet Union Red Army during World War II for men who drastically changed the outcome of a battle. 12,775 were awarded. Title of Hero of the Soviet Union was introduced by the Decree of the CEC of the USSR on 16 April 1934. After WW2 many other socialist countries established similar award. There were a lot of persons who was awarded more that one time.Star of the Hero of the Soviet Union Voenmag.com ==References== ==Other websites== Category:World War II Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of the Soviet Union Category:1934 establishments in Europe Category:1991 disestablishments in the Soviet Union Category:20th-century establishments in the Soviet Union
